FIGREF0.text: SISsim model, epidemic situation, poisson regression: Heatmaps showing the estimated transmission rates as percentage of the simulated transmission rate. The estimates are shown for four subsampling levels: 100%, 75%, 50% and 25%. Values in each cell show the relative standard deviation of the estimated rate divided by the simulated rate.
